title: end season rewards after mute
body: I've recently (a week ago) had a chat restriction of 10 games, my first ever penalty in 7 seasons, will I get the ranked rewards or not at the end of this season?

replies.body: As long as you don't get a 2-week suspension at this point, and clear your restrictions before the end of season you'll be fine.  Just make sure to play through those 10 games!  Check out our[ Ranked Eligibility](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068-2017-Ranked-Rewards-Eligibility) guide for more info as well!
I've played them and have reformed! When does honor get unlocked?
